nodes.bodyText: LOL I added it because I thought you said it was.  🤣  FWIW the smoke tests passed without it....should I take it back out?
oh, sorry, I don't think thrift uses grpc, so would probably remove it to avoid confusion (otlp and jaeger do, which is why those modules have it)
Got it.  I'll pull this back out.  Thanks!
